original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang hen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal nas phyir zlog pa rnam par gyal ba can zhes bya ba bshed byed dang byad sems ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang hen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal nas phyir zlog pa rnam par gyal ba can zhes bya ba bshed byed dang byad sems ba /
translated: Having paid homage to the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara, the noble one endowed with great compassion, I will explain the Jayavyūha-nāma-pratyaṃgīra, which destroys the spells and sorcery of enemies.

original: ro langs dang bkra mi shis pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
analyzed: ro langs dang bkra mi shis pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
translated: It pacifies all zombies and inauspiciousness.

original: rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa dang / yi dvags dang / sha za dang / grul bum gyi 'jigs pa dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa dang /
analyzed: rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa dang / yi dvags dang / sha za dang / grul bum gyi 'jigs pa dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa dang /
translated: It pacifies the fear of kings, the fear of thieves, the fear of fire, the fear of water, the fear of ḍākinīs, the fear of pretas, the fear of piśācas, the fear of kumbhāṇḍas, the fear of grahas,🔽the fear of the spoken word, the fear of bhūtas, the fear of unmādas, the fear of going astray on the path, the fear of going on the path,
